seo_keywords: Shark ZU62 brush roll hair wrap

problems.title: Hard to Push / Suction too strong
solution_steps: Twist the 'Suction Release' collar on the handle to open the vent (reduce suction).
Switch to 'Carpet' mode (brushroll on) to help movement.

problems.title: Dust Cup Latch Broken
problems.description: The bottom door of the dust cup won't stay closed.
solution_steps: The latch is not replaceable individually.
You need a new dust cup assembly.
